specs.title: Avoid anonymous comments
specs.description:
Enable this option if you want to allow commenting only to registered users with an open session.
Note: any module that extends the comments module and relies on interaction with comments and commenters may be affected by this switch.

specs.title: Amount to show on single posts
specs.description:
Amount of comments to show on a single post page. If there are more comments, they will be splitted in pages.
Defaults to 20.

specs.title: Show in post indexes
specs.description:
When post indexes are built, comment excerpts will be rendered when this option is enabled.
Note: enabling this option may add a small overhead to the database.

specs.title: Amount per post on indexes
specs.description:
Amount of comments to show per post entry on index pages.
Defaults to 10.

specs.title: Disable posting new comments after:
specs.description:
Specify the age in days a post should have so comment submissions/replies are blocked.
Set to 0 allow comments always.

specs.title: Flag for review on link amount
specs.description:
When the comment has the specified amount of links (or more), it will be flagged for review.
Defaults to 2.

specs.title: Privileged user level for automatic approval
specs.description:
Users of this level and up will be excluded from the "flag for review on link amount" rule. Defaults to 200 (moderator).
Please check the user levels setting to get hints on defined user levels.

specs.title: Duplicates check interval
specs.description:
When a comment is submitted, check within the specified amount of minutes for a message with the same content from the same user to avoid repeated messages.
Defaults to 1. Specify 0 to disable this check (not recommended).

specs.title: Sending speed check
specs.description:
Minimum amount of seconds to wait before a user can send a new comment.
Defaults to 30. Specify 0 to disable this check (not recommended).

specs.title: Maximum indent level
specs.description:
When rendering the comments tree, all children above this level will be kept in the specified value.
Defaults to 5.

specs.title: Time allowed for editing after submission
specs.description:
Amount of minutes a user has to edit a comment once submitted.
Set to 0 to disable comment editing non mods/admins.

specs.title: Use Triklet module for reporting comments?
specs.description: If the Triklet module is installed and enabled and this option is set to "Yes", online users that hit the "report comment" link will be redirected to Triklet's New Ticket composition form instead of going to the Contact form.
